sentences.sContent: He has the same mannerisms as his father.
sentences.sCn: 他举手投足跟他父亲一样。

synos.tran: 特殊习惯；矫揉造作；怪癖

remMethod.val: manner(风格， 方式) + ism(表风格、 特征) → 个人独有的言行 → 怪癖

words.tran: 矫饰的；守规矩的；矫揉造作的
方式；习惯；种类；规矩；风俗

trans.tranOther: a way of speaking or moving that is typical of a particular person
